markerNotFound.title: We couldn't find a marker matching the name or map: {{searchValue}}.
markerNotFound.instruction: Please try a different search value.

errorToast.markersWithoutInformation: Some markers have missing information and they may not be shown.
errorToast.mapNotFound: The map couldn't be found. Please make sure the maps are configured correctly.
errorToast.dataSourceMisconfigured: The data source or data source columns are misconfigured.
